QuestData.Title: To Venomspite!
QuestData.Description: I got a special bat all lined up for you, buddy. Fastest and smoothest ride I've got. He'll take you right to Venomspite - in style.$B$BJust hand that vial over to Chief Plaguebringer Middleton once you land.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Blight Specimen to Chief Plaguebringer Middleton at Venomspite in eastern Dragonblight.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh joyous day! And look, just beyond the mountain to the northeast creeps a whole field of Scourge for us to obliterate!
